title: How much money did the Harry Potter movies make? - Quora

response.answer_text: Harry Potter and the Philosopher’s Stone - $978,755,371 (Budget: $125 million) Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets - $878,979,634 (Budget: $100 million) Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban - $796,688,549 (Budget: $130 million) Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire - $896,911,078 (Budget: $150 million) Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix - $942,885,929 (Budget: $150 million) Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince - $934,416,487 (Budget: $250 million) Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1 - $976,283,305 {Budget spread between these two: Less than $250 million (official)}Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2 - $1,341,511,219 Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them - $814 million (Budget: $175 million) Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald - $654.9 million (Budget: $200 million)

Here is a break down of the box office earnings of each of the harry potter movies. But in total the movies (including the Fantastic Beasts spin off) have made 9.12 Billion USD. The Harry Potter movies standalone made 7.75 Billion USD.
